svg.style: background: transparent; background-color: transparent; color-scheme: light dark;

page="0" pageScale="1.5" pageWidth="826" pageHeight="1169" background="none" math="0" shadow="0"> <root> <mxCell id="0" /> <mxCell id="1" parent="0" /> <mxCell id="2" value=""
